channel.title: My Simple Program
channel.description:
I'm not sure if this goes here, but its Java and this section is called Java Programming.. Well I made this when I was bored and would like to show you guys my EXTREMLY! I repeat EXTREMLY! simple program. You might need [url=http://192.18.108.216/ECom/EComTicketServlet/BEGIN9AF6C94A4C4E4A664996E7EC751649B7/-2147483648/2560792959/1/387170/387134/2560792959/2ts+/westCoastFSEND/7829-jawsdp-1.0.1_02-oth-JPR/7829-jawsdp-1.0.1_02-oth-JPR:4/javaws-1_0_1_02-win-int-rt.exe]THIS[/url] to run it. Most of you should already have it. Its simple java graphics. No need to save it, just open it. (For IE users;You know how you have a option to save or open? Just click open. For Firefox users (YOU RULE); Firefox will choose the right program for it and just click open with) Download: [url=http://s1.uppit.com/d/WYO2OR]LINK[/url] ~!!FIXED!!~
Enjoy. ([b]Note:[/b] Might give you a headache after a while staring at it.)
UPDATED: Added more colours.

item.title: My Simple Program
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

lol yeah… me and kaos are the owners of aarscape (hemiscape) now, he gave it up along with the server along time ago… yes it was famous lol everyone loved hemiscape! :D…

but kaos seriously i get this error when i try to run the program it says

MissingFieldException[ The following required field is missing from the launch file: <jnlp>] at com.sun.javaws.jnl.XMLFormat.parse(Unknown Source) at com.sun.javaws.jnl.LaunchDescFactory.buildDescriptor(Unknown Source) at com.sun.javaws.jnl.LaunchDescFactory.buildDescriptor(Unknown Source) at com.sun.javaws.jnl.LaunchDescFactory.buildDescriptor(Unknown Source) at com.sun.javaws.Launcher.updateFinalLaunchDesc(Unknown Source) at com.sun.javaws.Launcher.prepareToLaunch(Unknown Source) at com.sun.javaws.Launcher.launch(Unknown Source) at com.sun.javaws.Main.launchApp(Unknown Source) at com.sun.javaws.Main.continueInSecureThread(Unknown Source) at com.sun.javaws.Main$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

lol any idea what i did wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: My Simple Program
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote="[Kaos"]link=topic=238213.msg2025508#msg2025508 date=1201862563]
AARisAIR is the true owner of aarscape but, then he gave ownership to Mr Robato, then he quit and gave it to me…

Sorry I didn’t know you had to register… Ill upload to uppit or boxstr or something.

Isn’t AARscape AARisAIR’s server? That shit was famous though, wasn’t it?

I believe AARisAIR’s server was hemiscape, but maybe he had more than one.

Hemiscape is AARScape but then he started back up Hemiscape called AARScape! :)[/quote]

I see. I apologize for my message above, I didn’t intend to be offensive.

Read full topic

item.title: My Simple Program
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote="[Kaos"]link=topic=238213.msg2024618#msg2024618 date=1201834691]
Ahh… Its just a download link from my site… Who said anything about register to my site? Its just a download link for my little thing…
I seriously don’t understand where you got that from Taharok… Boxstr is a file host, and the link to aarscape.net is just simply a download link, I didn’t ask anyone to actually go to the index page… I just used it as a download link for the jnlp file, if you know what that is. I try to show my little program to the moparisthebest community and I just get flamed at…[/quote]

You cannot download attachments on your forums without logging in and you cannot do that without registering. Therefore, provide another download link please.

Read full topic
